Michael Cohen has plead guilty to lying to Congress about President Trump’s business relationship with Russia. The American people deserve transparency and accountability in government & the new Democratic Majority in Congress must investigate President Trump’s business dealings.

Today marks the 30th anniversary of the Mississippi National River and Recreation Area! This Fourth District national park is the perfect place to take the natural beauty of the Mississippi River on a paddle, bike, or hike.
